_UnhandledExceptionPage.UnhandledSubtitle1: An Unhandled Error has occurred with an Exception Throw below:
_UnhandledExceptionPage.UnhandledSubtitle2: Oops, it seems like you've been disconnected from the Internet~ Or is it something else?
_UnhandledExceptionPage.UnhandledSubtitle3: The game has crashed with error details below:
_UnhandledExceptionPage.UnhandledSubtitle4:
This isn't a major issue, but we thought we should let you know:
Due to miHoYo A/B testing, Collapse does not support reading the following key: App_Settings_h2319593470.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

_HomePage.GamePlaytime_Running_Info2: Please be aware that fully closing Collapse will stop playtime tracking (saving what was played until that point) & only sessions started using Collapse will be tracked.

_SettingsPage.Debug_IncludeGameLogs: Save Game logs to Collapse's (might contain sensitive data)
_SettingsPage.Debug_MultipleInstance: Allow running multiple instances of Collapse
_SettingsPage.ChangeRegionWarning_Warning: *You need to restart the app for this setting to take effect.
_SettingsPage.AppLang_ApplyNeedRestart: *You need to restart the app for language changes to take effect.
_SettingsPage.AppThemes_ApplyNeedRestart: *You need to restart the app for theme changes to take effect.
_SettingsPage.AppBG_Note: Note: Image must be in .png, .jpg, .tiff or .bmp format and the resolution must be less than 4096x4096
_SettingsPage.AppThreads_Help1: This thread will handle how many chunks will be split while downloading files. This mechanism behaves in the same way as what IDM and aria2c do.
_SettingsPage.AppThreads_Help5: This thread will handle the extraction/verification process while installing/repairing the game.
_SettingsPage.AppThreads_Help6: Note: This setting is no longer effective while installing Honkai Impact 3rd.
_SettingsPage.DiscordRPC_GameStatusToggle: Show current game on Discord status
_SettingsPage.Update_LatestVer: You are using the latest version.
_SettingsPage.AppFiles_ClearMetadataDialogHelp:
Clearing Collapse metadata will cause Collapse to forcefully restart. Only use this if you have problems with region loading.
Are you sure?
_SettingsPage.Disclaimer1: This app is not affiliated with
_SettingsPage.Disclaimer3: and completely open-sourced. Any contribution is welcomed.
_SettingsPage.LowerCollapsePrioOnGameLaunch: Lower Collapse process resource usage when a game is launched
_SettingsPage.LowerCollapsePrioOnGameLaunch_Tooltip: Disables Carousel in main page and lower Collapse's priority to Below Normal
_SettingsPage.AppBehavior_LaunchOnStartup: Automatically start Collapse when your computer boots up
_SettingsPage.AppBehavior_StartupToTray: Hide Collapse window when it started up automatically
_SettingsPage.Waifu2X_Help:
Use Waifu2X to enlarge background images.
When turned on, the image quality is significantly improved, but it will take a little more time to load the image for the first time.
_SettingsPage.Waifu2X_Warning_CpuMode: WARNING: No available Vulkan GPU device was found and CPU mode will be used. This will greatly increase image processing time.
_SettingsPage.Waifu2X_Error_Loader: ERROR: Failed to initialize Vulkan Loader. Make sure you have a Vulkan-compatible GPU with a proper GPU driver installed.
_SettingsPage.Waifu2X_Error_Output: ERROR: Failed to pass Waifu2X check, got an empty output.

_Misc.CDNDescription_Github: The official (main) repository for the launcher.
_Misc.CDNDescription_Cloudflare: A mirror of the official (main) repository hosted in Cloudflare R2 bucket.

_Misc.CDNDescription_GitLab: A mirror of the official (main) repository hosted in GitLab

_Misc.Taskbar_PopupHelp2: Double click to toggle windows visibility
_Misc.Taskbar_HideConsole: Hide Collapse console window to taskbar

_Dialogs.DeltaPatchDetectedTitle: Warning: Delta Patch Update is Detected!
_Dialogs.DeltaPatchDetectedSubtitle:
Delta patch will be used to update your game from {0} to {1}.
Remember that you may still need to download some files in-game.

Do you wish to proceed?
_Dialogs.DeltaPatchPrevFailedTitle: Previous Delta Patch has been incorrectly applied or failed to finish applying!
_Dialogs.DeltaPatchPrevFailedSubtitle: The previous Delta Patch failed to apply. Do you want to restore your game to prevent a redownload?
_Dialogs.DeltaPatchPreReqTitle: Additional File Download is Required for Delta Patch!
_Dialogs.DeltaPatchPreReqSubtitle1: Additional file download is required for this game before applying delta patch. Around
_Dialogs.DeltaPatchPreReqSubtitle2: is required to be downloaded and some of these files might contains audio package deltas.
_Dialogs.GameConversionPrevFailedTitle: Previous Game Conversion either failed or was not completed!
_Dialogs.GameConversionPrevFailedSubtitle: The previous Game Conversion failed. Do you want to restore your game to prevent from redownloading?
_Dialogs.PreloadVerifiedSubtitle: Your pre-load package is verified and ready for installation!
_Dialogs.LocateInstallSubtitle: Before Installing the Game, Do you want to specify the location of the game?
_Dialogs.ChooseAudioLangSubtitle: Before installing the game, you need to choose which audio language you want to use (Default: Japanese):
_Dialogs.AddtDownloadNeededSubtitle:
You must download at least {0} of additional/persistent files. You can also skip this process and download it in-game instead.
Would you like to download them now?
_Dialogs.AddtDownloadCompletedSubtitle:
Additional/Persistent Download has been completed! 
Happy gaming!
_Dialogs.ExtremeGraphicsSettingsWarnSubtitle:
You are about to set the setting preset to Very High!
Very High setting preset is essentially a 2x Render Scale with MSAA Enabled and is VERY UNOPTIMIZED!

Are you sure you want to use this setting?
_Dialogs.MigrateExistingInstallChoiceTitle: An Existing Installation of {0} is Detected!
_Dialogs.MigrateExistingInstallChoiceSubtitle1: You have an existing installation of the game using {0} on this directory:
_Dialogs.MigrateExistingInstallChoiceSubtitle2: You have an option to move your existing game data into another directory or use the current directory as the existing one. It's recommended that you use the current directory as the one already installed to ensure that you can still launch your game using {0}.
_Dialogs.ExistingInstallSubtitle:
Game has already been installed at:

{0}

It is recommended to migrate the game to Collapse Launcher for better support and integration.
Rest assured, you can still use Official Launcher to start the game.

Do you wish to proceed?
_Dialogs.ExistingInstallBHI3LSubtitle:
Game has already been installed at:

{0}

It is recommended to migrate the game to Collapse Launcher for better support and integration.
Rest assured, you can still use BetterHi3Launcher to start the game.

Do you wish to proceed?
_Dialogs.ExistingInstallSteamSubtitle:
Game has already been installed on Steam at:

{0}

Do you wish to convert this version to the Non-Steam Global version?
Note: Once you initiate the conversion, you can no longer log-in with your Steam account. Only the miHoYo/HoYoverse account login method will be available.

Do you wish to proceed with the conversion and migration?
_Dialogs.SteamConvertNeedMigrateSubtitle:
You need to migrate the game installation folder to another location as Collapse does not have permission to write to that directory.
It is recommended to move the location to the CollapseLauncher game folder.

Do you want to move it to the CollapseLauncher game folder?
_Dialogs.SteamConvertIntegrityDoneSubtitle:
Game Data Integrity check complete! The conversion process will download at least {0} of files.
You can continue or cancel and come back later.

Do you wish to start the conversion process?
_Dialogs.SteamConvertFailedSubtitle:
Conversion process has failed! :(
Please try to start the conversion process again.
_Dialogs.InstallCorruptDataAnywaySubtitle1: You're about to extract this corrupted data:
_Dialogs.InstallCorruptDataAnywaySubtitle3:
. Keep in-mind that the extraction for this data might fail or renders the game fail to run.

Are you sure to extract this data anyway?
_Dialogs.InstallDataDownloadResumeSubtitle:
You have downloaded {0}/{1} of the game previously.

Do you want to resume the download?
_Dialogs.InsufficientDiskSubtitle:
You do not have enough free space to install this game on your {2} drive!

Free Space: {0}
Required Space: {1}.

Please ensure that you have enough disk space before proceeding with the installation.
_Dialogs.MigrationSubtitle: Before migrating, do you wish to specify the location of the game?
_Dialogs.NeedInstallMediaPackTitle: Media Feature Pack cannot be found!
_Dialogs.NeedInstallMediaPackSubtitle1: WARNING: Starting from the v5.8 update, Honkai Impact 3rd needs the "Media Feature Pack" to be installed on your PC in order to run properly. This will fix the "Unable to load DLL 'cri_ware_unity'" error in-game.
_Dialogs.NeedInstallMediaPackSubtitle2: You may need to restart your PC after you've installed the "Media Feature Pack". You can safely ignore this warning if you already have it installed or wish to attempt playing Honkai Impact 3rd, but there is a chance that you will get the error while running the game.
_Dialogs.InstallMediaPackCompleteTitle: Media Feature Pack has been installed!
_Dialogs.InstallMediaPackCompleteSubtitle:
Media Feature Pack has been installed on your PC.
Please restart your PC to apply the patch!
_Dialogs.GameConfigBrokenSubtitle1: The Launcher Scope's config is broken. Please choose your previous game path manually.
_Dialogs.GameConfigBrokenSubtitle2:
Make sure that the location of the game is not the same as the path of your launcher's "config.ini" file, which is found at:

{0}
_Dialogs.GameConfigBrokenSubtitle3: If the above is valid, please move all of your game files to another location, then click on "Locate directory" to choose the path.
_Dialogs.CookbookLocateSubtitle1:
Please locate the downloaded Cookbook before starting the process.
If you haven't downloaded it yet,
_Dialogs.CookbookLocateSubtitle3: to download the Cookbook file and then click
_Dialogs.CookbookLocateSubtitle5: to locate the downloaded Cookbook file before continuing.
_Dialogs.CookbookLocateSubtitle7: Here is the name of the Cookbook file you need to download:
_Dialogs.PrivilegeMustRunSubtitle: Collapse requires administrative privileges to function properly. Would you like to restart Collapse and run it as administrator?
_Dialogs.ReleaseChannelChangeSubtitle1: You are about to change your release channel to:
_Dialogs.ReleaseChannelChangeSubtitle3: This action may cause irreversible changes and/or cause things to break from your current setup. We are not responsible for any loss or corruption of data associated with your game.
_Dialogs.ChangePlaytimeTitle: Are you sure you want to change your playtime?
_Dialogs.ChangePlaytimeSubtitle:
Changing your playtime means overwriting the current value with the one you just inputted. 

Do you wish to proceed?

Note: This has no impact on how Collapse operates and you can change this value again at any time when not playing the game.
_Dialogs.ResetPlaytimeTitle: Are you sure you want to reset your playtime?
_Dialogs.ResetPlaytimeSubtitle: Resetting your playtime means setting the playtime counter back to 0. This is a
_Dialogs.ResetPlaytimeSubtitle3:
action, meaning that you cannot undo this once you confirm. 

Do you wish to proceed?

Note: This has no impact on how Collapse operates and you can change this value again at any time when not playing the game.
_Dialogs.InvalidPlaytimeTitle: There was a problem saving this session's playtime
_Dialogs.InvalidPlaytimeSubtitle1: The difference between the starting and ending times results in a negative number.
_Dialogs.InvalidPlaytimeSubtitle2: A fallback value is saved every minute and will be used instead:
_Dialogs.InvalidPlaytimeSubtitle3: Please refrain from adjusting the computer clock while in-game.
_Dialogs.LocateExePathSubtitle: Please point Collapse to the location of your application's executable:
_Dialogs.CannotUseAppLocationForGameDirSubtitle: You can't use this folder as it is being used as a system folder or being used for main executable of the app. Please choose another folder!
_Dialogs.StopGameSubtitle:
Are you sure you want to force stop current running game?
You may lose some in-game progress.
_Dialogs.MeteredConnectionWarningSubtitle: Your current internet connection was detected as being 'Metered'! Continuing the update process may incur additional charges from your internet provider. Do you wish to proceed?
_Dialogs.ResetKbShortcutsTitle: Are you sure you want to reset all shortcuts?
_Dialogs.ResetKbShortcutsSubtitle:
This means every shortcut will be changed to their default key combination. 

Do you wish to proceed?

Note: This has no impact on how Collapse operates and you can still change the combination of shortcuts by accessing the Keyboard Shortcuts menu.
_Dialogs.OperationErrorDiskSpaceInsufficientTitle: Disk Space for Drive: {0} is Insufficient!
_Dialogs.OperationErrorDiskSpaceInsufficientMsg:
You do not have enough free space to do the operation on your {2} drive!

Free Space: {0}
Required Space: {1}.

Please ensure that you have enough disk space before proceeding.
_Dialogs.OperationWarningNotCancellableTitle: Attention: This Operation is NOT CANCELLABLE!
_Dialogs.OperationWarningNotCancellableMsg1: You might need to check that you don't have any heavy tasks running on your computer to avoid possible issues while the process is running. Keep in-mind that you
_Dialogs.GenericWarningExceptionSubtitle: This isn't a major issue, but we thought we should let you know:
_Dialogs.ShortcutCreationConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to continue?
_Dialogs.ShortcutCreationConfirmSubtitle1: A shortcut will be created in the following path:
_Dialogs.ShortcutCreationConfirmSubtitle2: If there is already a shortcut with the same name in this folder, it will be replaced.
_Dialogs.ShortcutCreationConfirmCheckBox: Automatically start game after using this shortcut
_Dialogs.ShortcutCreationSuccessSubtitle1: A shiny new shortcut was created!
_Dialogs.ShortcutCreationSuccessSubtitle4: • Using this shortcut will start the game after loading the region.
_Dialogs.SteamShortcutCreationConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to continue?
_Dialogs.SteamShortcutCreationConfirmSubtitle1: A shortcut will be added to every Steam user in this computer.
_Dialogs.SteamShortcutCreationConfirmSubtitle2: If already added, the assets related to the shortcut will be verified.
_Dialogs.SteamShortcutCreationConfirmCheckBox: Automatically start game after using this shortcut
_Dialogs.SteamShortcutCreationSuccessSubtitle1: A new shiny shortcut was added to every Steam users in this computer!
_Dialogs.SteamShortcutCreationSuccessSubtitle3: • Using this shortcut will start the game after loading the region.
_Dialogs.SteamShortcutCreationSuccessSubtitle4: • Running this process again will fix any corrupted/missing images belonging to the shortcut.
_Dialogs.SteamShortcutCreationSuccessSubtitle5: • New shortcuts will only be shown after Steam is reloaded.
_Dialogs.SteamShortcutCreationSuccessSubtitle6: • In order to use the Steam overlay, Steam needs to be run as administrator and Collapse must either be fully closed or have the "Multiple Instances" option enabled in the settings.
_Dialogs.SteamShortcutCreationFailureSubtitle:
It was not possible to find a valid userdata folder.

Please be sure to login at least once to the Steam client before trying to use this functionality.

_AppNotification.NotifMetadataUpdateSubtitle: New metadata for the launcher is available! This process is automatic and is done to ensure that the launcher can properly communicate with the miHoYo/HoYoverse servers. The update will begin shortly!

_AppNotification.NotifPreviewBuildUsedSubtitle: You are currently using a [PREVIEW] build, which is still being tested. If you encounter any issues, please report them by using the "{0}" button below. Thanks!
_AppNotification.NotifKbShortcutSubtitle:
We are introducing a new way to navigate around Collapse, Keyboard Shortcuts.
You can now use your keyboard to have faster access to some functionalities!

Wanna know more?
Try using CTRL + Tab or click the button below.

_StarRailGameSettingsPage.Graphics_ResCustomTooltip: Custom Resolution can only be used with Resizable Window enabled

If your menu is broken in-game, use Collapse to change the Game Graphics Settings.

_GenshinGameSettingsPage.Language_Help1: Collapse currently cannot download Audio package directly.
_GenshinGameSettingsPage.Language_Help2: Audio package will be downloaded in-game next time you launch the game.

_KbShortcuts.General_OpenMenu_Desc: This can also be accessed through the App Settings page.
_KbShortcuts.General_ReloadRegion_Desc:
Pressing F5 is an alternative to this shortcut.
Please note that reloading the Home Page will reload the region.
_KbShortcuts.Switch_Subtitle: Note: The keybinds follow the selector order.
_KbShortcuts.Switch_ChangeGame_Desc:
You can use the NumPad for this shortcut too!
E.g. {0}+1 or NumPad1 (without the {0} modifier) leads to Honkai Impact 3rd's page (last used region).
_KbShortcuts.Switch_ChangeRegion_Desc: E.g. For Genshin Impact, {0}+1 leads to the Global region.
_KbShortcuts.GameManagement_Subtitle: Note: These keybinds only work if such feature is supported in the region.
_KbShortcuts.GameManagement_ForceCloseGame_Desc: WARNING: By using this shortcut, the game will be closed without any type of confirmation.
_KbShortcuts.GameManagement_GoRepair: Go to the Game Repair page
_KbShortcuts.GameManagement_GoSettings: Go to the Game Settings page
_KbShortcuts.GameManagement_GoCaches: Go to the Caches Repair page
_KbShortcuts.ChangeShortcut_Text: Type the new combination for this shortcut!
_KbShortcuts.ChangeShortcut_Help1: A shortcut is composed by 2 parts:
_KbShortcuts.ChangeShortcut_Help3: ・ Key - Alphabetical (A to Z) or Tab
_KbShortcuts.ChangeShortcut_Help4: You can choose any combination consisting of one value from each category, unless it is reserved by the system or is already being used.

_OOBEStartUpMenu.CustomizationSettingsLanguageDescription: This will adjust the language for the information displayed.
_OOBEStartUpMenu.CustomizationSettingsWindowSizeDescripti: Change the size of the launcher.
_OOBEStartUpMenu.CustomizationSettingsCDNDescription: Select your primary Content Delivery Network to be used.
_OOBEStartUpMenu.CustomizationSettingsStyleDescription: Change the look of the launcher and prefer your choice.
_OOBEStartUpMenu.CustomizationSettingsStyleThemeDescripti: Change the color that appear in your launcher.
_OOBEStartUpMenu.CustomizationSettingsStyleCustomBackgrou: Use custom background image instead of default one.
_OOBEStartUpMenu.LoadingCDNCheckingSubitle: Finding the nearest Content Delivery Network (CDN) server for you...
_OOBEStartUpMenu.LoadingBackgroundImageSubtitle: The image might take a while to get processed.
